markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11+"
    pfs=""
>
[Inubrix Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1416)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 98</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk**  varies by armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Inubrix](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1415)

</column>

---

Inubrix's malleable nature means armor crafted from it is less rigid than usual, though this slightly increased mobility comes at the cost of protection. Metal armor crafted from inubrix gains the [flexible](/Traits.aspx?ID=204) armor trait; its item bonus to AC decreases by 1 but its maximum Dexterity bonus increases by 1.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Inubrix Armor (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 98</row>

**Price** 1,200 gp (+120 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include at least 150 gp of inubrix + 15 gp per Bulk.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Inubrix Armor (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 98</row>

**Price** 18,000 gp (+1,800 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include at least 9,000 gp of inubrix + 900 gp per Bulk.
name: Inubrix Armor (High-Grade)
